website_summaries.verdict: Simple modern design in an end table that carries a very low price point with an all-wood construction.
pros: Holds more weight than you might think it would for a small table
Very basic design with a square table top and square legs on all four corners
cons: Consists of particle board and laminate, so it may not last as long as some other units

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee table for the money. You just screw in the legs in two minutes and you are all set! Key is not to screw them in too tight. The table wasn't 100% level on the ground when I put it together, but then I put it on a rug and it doesn't wobble. Great for the price, even if it's a bit delicate.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLux

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions shown are not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple of these at the same time. One is to use as an end table and two are to use for an enclosure for my 3D printer. Out of the box they are easy to assembly, lightweight and look good. My only complaint is the dimensions shown with the pictures are not accurate. I printed some parts in advance that did not fit because of these inaccuracies. I have included a picture of accurate dimensions. Please view these if you need the actual dimensions of the end table.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional in a Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I am using this little table in my classroom. I am transitioning my room into flexible seating, so I purchased this to use as a small group table where students could sit on the floor. Five of my fifth graders can comfortably work at this table. They love sitting on this table, especially during our guided practice. I love how lightweight this table is! I can easily pick this table up and move it around my room. It is also light enough that my students can move it to see the SmartBoard if they need to. It wipes clean easily with a Clorox wipe, which is essential in a classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheap table for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a nightstand table next to my bed. I don’t put anything heavy on it and it’s hold up very well. Legs are even and there is no wobble and the put together is very simple. I also used VViViD XPO White Grey Marble Gloss Vinyl Film Contact Paper to cover the top to add extra glam to an ordinary table.
customer_reviews.author: Nykia

customer_reviews.title: Very good, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, could be a little sturdier. What I think it's worth: $50 Look of finish 9.5/10 Quality of finish 8.5/10 Sturdiness 8/10 Assembly 10/10 5 min one person Packaging 9/10
customer_reviews.author: glenn hart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lego table!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a lego table for my daughter, it fits four 10x10 lego bade square perfectly!! Super easy to assemble, just twist in the legos and you are done! No tools needed!! Just some strong glue to attach the lego bases. I attached a picture of the “lego” bases I bought, they work and are a little cheaper than buying lego brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ FIRST !!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE READ FIRST -came in broken twice, plus it is made of cardboard no joke cardboard not even particle board and all pieces are hollow table top too hollow. I really can't believe the rating is so high on this.. can't trust rating systems any more, can't believe people like this product.
customer_reviews.author: sylvester gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Lego Table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table and used silcone to glue four 10x10 Lego plates to the top. My son loves his new Lego table. It was only $40 to contruct, much cheaper than "official" Lego tables out there.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Creamcheese

customer_reviews.title: At $20, the deal of the year!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small table for $20 or less to support my printer - any piece of junk that would do the job. I saw this and gave it a shot - WOW! This not only supported a large load, but looks VERY nice! A steal at $20!
customer_reviews.author: Rhinin

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap table but does have those California warnings
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. But I’m only giving it four stars, because it has all those bad chemicals that California says will give you cancer! So, every time I look at this table I feel guilty!! However, after months looking for a table that didn’t have the bad chemicals, I finally gave up. On a cheerier note, within just a few minutes of receiving this you can have a cute little table in place that’s perfect for eating dinner in front of the TV, serving birthday cake on (our first use!), or for whatever else you may want to use this for. And you definitely can’t beat the price, at least in the short run.
customer_reviews.author: MominVirginia

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. I used for living room coffee table
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddler dining table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this side table because I need an extra table for my daughter to dine, besides the kidcraft table that she has in the playroom. This table is at a perfect height and so easy to clean. It is very easy to assemble and I am very happy with the quality. My daughter uses it everyday and this is worth every penny that I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalila

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting anything amazing, for the price I expected something that was going to fit the way I needed it to in my workout room. Big enough to support a receiver and for the sub to fit under it. It did have some scratches on the surface so it wouldn't have been something that I would want to put out in a main area of the house, but again for what I need it for it is just right. Knocked a star off because even if it fits my needs, I didn't really want to buy something with a few scratches already provided.
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this table before it arrived but found it is actually a very nice table and super easy to assemble. It is very light weight but doesn't look overly cheap at all. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: frog4jess

customer_reviews.title: Decent Little Table
customer_reviews.text: Simple, 5-minute assembly. The matte finish wipes clean easily but seems to be prone to scratches. Stable enough for light use, although not incredibly sturdy. I ordered two; One seems to be used. It had a big crack in the edge (pictured) and dirty fingerprints on it. Price ($34.99) seems OK for a product of this quality, assuming you get an undamaged one. Except for the busted table, I'm happy with this purchase. Would recommend, although I'm detracting a star for the damage. If I can get some kind of resolution to that issue, I'll amend my review.
customer_reviews.author: Wolff Laarcen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for between my chairs. Assembly was a breeze. The color is just what I wanted. Nothing fancy at all, but if u need a basic little table this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shevaughn Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for increasing height of mini refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to raise the height of my Black & Decker 2.7 cf mini refrigerator off of the ground. This thing is super simple to setup, as all four legs have screws installed into the top of each table leg. The bottom of the tabletop has four pre-drilled holes for the four table legs. All that is needed to build it is to flip the tabletop upside and then screw in each of the four legs. The mini-fridge weighs approximately 40 lbs and this end table has no issue supporting it that I can observe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very basic end tables, but work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as nightstands for my guest bedroom. They are a little too short as compared to the height of the bed, but they get the job done and they were inexpensive. I was looking for grey tables and there were few options. In the end, these worked out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stein

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for my sectional and for the price I'm pleased with it. The fake wood grain looks pretty good, too. The edges are sharp and you can tell it's a cheaper table, however, it's holding up well to being a footrest, cat jungle gym, drink and food holder, etc. If you're on a tight budget and don't need to have the highest quality furniture, I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MidtermMassacre

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light & cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. 5 minute assembly time for two tables! Just screw the legs in. My 2 & 4 year old sat on one and no problems. For $17 it is amazing and I may just order more for the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Baker

customer_reviews.title: Depends which price you paid...
customer_reviews.text: Realize that one day this table was priced at almost 2x what I paid. For what I paid it is maybe a 5 star. If you paid the higher price it would be 3 stars at best. I know that over time the legs will more than likely get wobbly. They have a large wood screw at the end that connects to the table top. You twist the leg into a predrilled hole. Thats it. They do manage to all end up in the correct position. I brought it to put my 3d printer on in a closet. Hopefully it is sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Omadna

customer_reviews.title: Temporary has become temporarily permanent
customer_reviews.text: We got these because we couldn't make up our minds about what type side table to use in the bedroom. They were supposed to be temporary, but we're still using them. The cats can't knock them over, they are easy to keep clean. The gray color is, well, gray... but they seem to blend in so well, you hardly can see that they are there! We thought that, for the price, we could easily change the color anytime because they are minimalist in design. They're just the right height for next to a bed. Someday, if we find something else, we can still change them and donate them to a thrift store charity without any regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Cmartcookie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control -- don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: There was a large, thick raised streak running across the finish on the top of this table... had to pack everything up and take it to a shipping outlet to return it, what a waste of time. There's clearly no meaningful quality control being done by the manufacturer. (This item was described as "used -- like new" by Amazon and there was no mention of this glaring defect, or of dents and peeled/chipped laminate on most of the corners of the table -- their quality control is apparently as bad as the manufacturer's and their condition description was an outright lie!)
customer_reviews.author: sillyrat

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together. I've used it as a foot rest sitting on the couch and it's holding up great. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Pay very close attention to the measurements.
customer_reviews.text: I like these tables, but please...PLEASE be sure to pay close attention to the measurements and NOT the picture. These tables are much lower to the ground than they seem in the picture. I stacked two one on top of the other to achieve something close to the desired height. This in no way indicates that there is anything wrong with them, they are actually quite sturdy. I just wish they were a little taller. My fault for not paying attention to the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: JewelBeeTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a simple, light weight coffee table with espresso color finish for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted just a basic table without the second bottom shelf, with these dimensions. I didn't want anything too nice or good quality because I will be eating and drinking on it, etc. It is cheap looking up close but that's what you get for the low price. I think its good for family and kid use. The reason for the 4 stars is because it seems like the finish will tarnish or scratch easily without a table cloth on it for surface protection if it gets everyday use. Nonetheless, for me and my purpose this is worth the buy and expect to get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Buy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much when purchasing this end table. I bought it for it's clean lines, and it's simplistic nature. Also, it's price! It does a good job of looking sleek. This item takes 2 minutes to put together. It's sturdy particle board, but I don't trust it to hold much more than a lamp. I currently have it in my guest bedroom. I like it, and would buy it again, however- I don't see it withstanding the test of time. It's definitely a temporary piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: The espresso matches my dark brown recliner perfect and a four year old could assemble it in ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive end table next to a recliner in man cave (well, really just my personal TV room lol!) and viola! The espresso matches my dark brown recliner perfect and a four year old could assemble it in five minutes. I put it together while holding my cell phone talking to a friend. It is plastic, but sturdy, and will hold my remotes, drink and food....thus fulfilling its purpose. If you're expecting a herman miller or knoll piece of furniture to showcase in your home, for less than $25, then you should be more realistic. It's basically a college apartment piece of furniture that looks pretty good next to my recliner. I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broken after minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it broke beyond repair after about four months of use. I think it’s really pretty cheaply made and not built to last. I wish i spent ten dollars more and bought one at Ikea. It always felt light weight and flimsy but I am a college student and this was my cheapest option, I’m surprised other people have had such a positive experience but i believe this table is not at all worth the money. Not to mention the paint chips off, it’s really bad quality. I would give it zero stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU WONT REGRET THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS WONDERFUL! Best 20$ EVER spent!!! Seriously, you won’t regrets buying this product. I am SOOO picky with furniture and have been looking for an end table for months for this little spot. I’ve purchased ones for over 100$ am returned them because I didn’t like them. Somehow the most affordable item ever, is truly the best. No hassle put together it took me a solid 60 seconds. Definitely will scratch easily I feel like judging by the type of material but maybe not. Either way, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Carras

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap tables
customer_reviews.text: Great good looking cheap table. I use these things for displaying figures and they work great. You can superglue them on top of each other and they work great! I’ve bought these several times over the years for like 20 bucks. These things are a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Charland

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: We’re using this with toddler chairs as a toddler table. It’s the perfect height for my 2.5 year-old to sit or stand at, good small size, and the gray hides any marker smudges unless you get up close. It’s not the most sturdy thing in the world - it’s quite lightweight - but that can be a pro or con depending on how you plan to use it - and that’s to be expected at this price point. My toddler is a climber and I’ve found her on top of it plenty of times and it’s stood up quite well. I prefer this over the larger and more cumbersome oak toddler table set we previously had.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: what a price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little table for the price! Depends what you need it for. I use it for putting this and that in a room that has no shelves or storage--not heavy stuff. It's white plastic of course--nothing fancy. I gave a 4-star only because it's a bit light so don't know how sturdy it is in the long run. Seems oK though. There was nothing to assemble--it came all ready. I recommend it if you buy it for the right job.
customer_reviews.author: fruitjuicer1

customer_reviews.title: Simple Table & Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with Amazon's shipping and arrival times of this item but overall it worked out. Simple table, simple design. My boyfriend had me order this same table in 2015. We just moved into a place together (2017) and I needed a table for "my side" of the couch, I figured I'd keep it looking matchy and uniform and bought a 2nd one. The table is sturdy, it has a 50 pound weight limit. Sooooo easy to assemble. Its the table top and 4 legs with screws that screw right in, no tools required!! Easy peasy. It arrived in its own box, no other shipping materials or bulky boxes (it was also a single item order).
customer_reviews.author: Cold In Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Highly functional junk
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's an excellent purchase. If you need a very basic table, this is a very basic low quality table. If you drop anything on it the table will dent or a hole will appear, so it has very low durability, but if you need something for temporary use, or move frequently and need lightweight furniture, or simply need a table on a budget, this one's fine. It's not going to win any prizes for looks but I suppose it's stark minimalism has a charm of its own. To assemble or disassemble you simple pick up a leg and twist it into or out of the corresponding hole beneath the table - It doesn't get much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the price !
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have much to spend on an end table and Needed one for a guest room. For 15 bucks I’m extremely happy !! You can’t expect too much out of a table for that price, but this honestly exceeded my expectations. There were two tiny chip offs of the white on the legs but I put that side of the table against the wall so you couldn’t see it. Is the material kinda cheap? Yes. However it holds up great and is very sturdy and even... and for the price I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shire1022

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Holds up great and fits our daughter’s dollhouse perfectly. She put it together and can move it to play behind. She’s 10. Very affordable and beautiful option. Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Becca W

customer_reviews.title: This coffee table can only hold coffee
customer_reviews.text: Look, its a $30 coffee table, so I knew what I was getting into with this sucker, but I didnt expect to receive a table thats made out of cardboard. It says max weight is 50 lbs but theres no way thats correct. Just by touching the top of the table, there is a cracking sound and obvious flex to the entire thing. I expect this table will last me until the end of the week before it collapses under itself once someone dares put their cellphone on top of it at the same time as all of my remote controls.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: I've bought two of these now and they are a really great value and very good looking
customer_reviews.text: I thought I should leave a review of this product seeing as I've just bought a second one this week and they are really nice end tables. The table is very sturdy and has a great finish, unlike some of the other inexpensive pieces I've bought in this color from other brands. Putting the table together is extremely simple: it's a top and four legs - all of which simply screw into the pre-drilled holes until snug and aligned with the corners. That's it. It takes about two minutes and the table is large, roomy and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Merchantprince

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in it arriving damaged (twice)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first one and it was replaced quickly because it came very damaged. The second one came and we put it together only to immediately notice that the side is peeling up already! We’ve had one before and so we know the quality. It’s basically a little table for the kids to sit at and out last one lasted 5 years until it broke. Not impressed that these keep coming damaged, but I can’t box this up and send it back now.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy9Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad End Table for price
customer_reviews.text: It's very cheaply made, however, I already knew that when I purchased it. The assembly is very easy. They come ready to screw in. Convenient enough. It's super light weight and I give it a few months before my kids/pets destroy it. I am not disappointed at all though. I love it and it's fairly priced. I wanted to get the cheapest end table to see how it would hold up with the kids/pets before buying a better version in the future. So we shall see...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sze

customer_reviews.title: Tables got moldy after a year!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two coffee tables for a duplex unit, where the units feature identical furniture. We ordered these coffee tables last June 2019 and by July 2020 we discovered green mold seeping out of the underside of BOTH tables. We were out of the return period, so decided to bleach spray and clean the items, dry them and paint the bottoms. The mold came back twice as bad. We have ended up trashing the tables and purchasing new items from a different maker.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma's mom

customer_reviews.title: I still can't believe the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice little table. I got it for my cat's food and water so the dog wouldn't get into it but it's so cute and it would be great for a kid's room, a craft room, or even as your living room coffee table. It was incredibly easy to assemble (all of the screws were pre-attached so you just twist the legs onto the base). I wouldn't say it's as sturdy as a solid wood table and I definitely wouldn't sit on it as an adult but for that price, it's more than adequate!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Bought @ $20
customer_reviews.text: At $20, this is great. 5 piece assembly and it's literally just screwing in the bottom to the board. Easy. Looked great. However I noticed it jumped in price after I ordered mine. I guess I got lucky. The material is decent, but I'm not sure if it's $37.99 decent (what it's currently priced at). Either way, happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: SewDough.

customer_reviews.title: Quality matches price
customer_reviews.text: While I love how easy this table was to put together (just screw the legs on directly, 5-10 min tops) and the way it looks, the quality is certainly not beyond the value. It's far lighter than you will expect, and only good for holding lighter items (not recommended for a foot rest). The main issue is that the bottom side is unfinished and the top/side material is barely glued on. The edges on the sides are already peeling after a week, though maybe I can offset that with wood glue.
customer_reviews.author: Osujin

customer_reviews.title: For short term use
customer_reviews.text: Mind you I got it just a minute ago and put it together in less theb five minutes. However it arrived damaged. I don't mind some of the dust and stuff I had to wipe off but the damaged sides bother me. This table is only going to tide us over until Ican get a better since we just moved. I think my judgment on the quality of the wood is harsher considering the entertainment center I bought and put together has a much firmer and sturdier wood. At the ens of the day its not going to last us long I suspect but it will do the job. Its not flimsy but the cracking of wood makes me wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Great for some, not for others
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is really easy but it also isn't a particularly durrable material or design. It's clearly designed to be as light weight for shipping as possible. No included brackets to add stability, and it will probably tear the legs out the first time a dog or kid runs into it. If you're an adult with an apartment you want to furnish cheap, and you take good care of your things then this will be perfect for you. If you have a family or large pets, or room mates who put their feet on things maybe look for something less disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Although made of particle board, can't beat these for the price. Sturdy, extremely easy to assemble and look very nice and perfect size to use as "night stands" alongside my new platform bed.
customer_reviews.author: Zirona

customer_reviews.title: Nice use for my 1up machines
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of the 1up arcade machines and on their own, they are way to short to stand and play the game. I read somewhere online that people were using this particular table, so I figured I'd try them out. Worked perfectly. Nice fit and the tables literally take under 5 minutes to assemble. You just twist the legs into the table and you are good to go. I havent had any issues with the machines sliding off during playing and they seem to be very sturdy with holding the weight. Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cmrad

customer_reviews.title: By far the worst quality item I’ve got on amazon
customer_reviews.text: It is very wobbly. Little bit of pressure makes a creaking sound. It feels hollow inside and not real wood. Feels cheaply made and should be worth 20 bucks.. legs are slanted and I’m not sure how much it will hold. Edit 05/08/20: one of the legs came loose just by having a Xbox on top of it and the whole thing is flimsy. I would take a picture but it’s already packed because I’m returning it tomorrow. Do not waste your money. It’s 10 maximum! Feels like a hard foam table with a spear like screw you screw the legs in to the table top. I bought another end table and it’s perfect. Same price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac wolf

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with holes punctured through the bottom and top cracked
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with two holes that were punched through the bottom. As well as the corner cracked and separated. This looks like it was mishandled while being shipped but I would have hoped the product was of high enough quality that this wouldn't happen. Looks like it is very cheap and easily damaged. Will update when Amazon delivers a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a college student or a starter
customer_reviews.text: This is actually in the space my high schooler and college student share and is perfect for them. They can put their feet on it, they keep a cute little plant and a couple books on top of it, it does the job. We don't have little little kids in the house and they don't store anything under it but they could if they wanted to. Maybe a couple bins or well-measured storage ottomans or something. It's exactly perfect for their situation.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N.

customer_reviews.title: It's a table that tables table-iffically!
customer_reviews.text: Could not have been easier to put together; the hardest part of assembly was going upstairs to get my tools and come back downstairs, only to realize that there were literally no tools required. It's nothing flashy, but it achieves the purpose it was purchased for: putting things on. Nice to have affordable options like this when elegance and glitz isn't a requirement. That said, the "finish" on this piece actually looks pretty nice and matches our other, more substantial, furniture fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Needed something inexpensive yet nice looking for our basement for our kids to abuse. These fit the bill and I'm very happy with the look and durability. Very light and I'm sure they can't take a real beating but for the price they're awesome. Look expensive yet weigh very little. So easy to assemble with NO tools. Took about 10 minutes from box to using. Highly recommend for a real budget furniture. Got the end tables that match also A+++
customer_reviews.author: FRusso

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made table
customer_reviews.text: This table is easy to assemble. You just screw the lesson and you are done. Make sure you don't screw them in too tight or you will hear the particle board cracking. This table is not meant for any water to get on it either. You can hear the board cracking when you press on it hard to wipe it down. Doesn't look bad as a table with decor on it. Would not suggest using it as a normal coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: The tables for 11 bucks area not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: The tables for 11 bucks area not bad at all. But man there very short. I guess I shoulda really paid more attention to the height of them. But compared to our COUCH's or Bed's.. This is REALLY really low. I basiclly need to stack 2 on top of each other drill into the legs to secure it and then chop off about 3 -4 inches of the bottom set of legs to make it a normal height.. but hey for $22 bucks it's a great end table.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K.

customer_reviews.title: Great table for a phenomenal price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple table for a large copier/printer/scanner that I have, and this fit the need perfectly. Its lightweight, but surprisingly sturdy. The construction and finish is very similar to items you'd find at Ikea, but the price was phenomenal...you just can't go wrong with this for $15! It assembles in a snap (literally, screw four legs by hand into the table top). I was going to make my own table, but I couldn't find the materials for cheaper. If you need a basic, sturdy, attractive table - look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Review4U

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: For $20 you cant beat it. We've been looking for an end table with a charging station for a while now. When I came across this end table I knew i could just build a charging station on it for less than half the price of one with it already. It is hallow, but it assembles quickly. Arrived before expected woth bo damage. Would recommend again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap side table :)
customer_reviews.text: This works great for holding stuff by my bed. It was super easy to assemble, no tools required, and does the job it is intended to do. You can't go wrong for $20 bucks. I could have gotten one for 60 to 80 but my budget doesn't allow me to right now. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Came with large gash on top surface
customer_reviews.text: Let me be clear this was a returned and slightly discounted item. I took the risk knowing what my uses would be. Came with a large gash on top surface, but I placed a very large floor A/C unit (speaks to its sturdiness). I had already purchased one of these full price and was very satisfied. I'm way too lazy to return this, and will live with it. Roll of the dice when you buy returns.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Literally "disposable" furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see in front of my home office work desk; I keep cords, speakers and my printer on it and it's "okay". As long as you don't move it or really do anything on top of it other than just let stuff sit on it, then it's okay. If you can't afford anything else and just need something to get you buy until you can afford something better then this might work but candidly, better off just saving the money and putting it towards a better quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: ... this and putting it together yesterday which was so easy just screwing in the legs tightly for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd write this review as so many are Doing from people that got the item for free or at a discount I did not but I have to say after purchasing this and putting it together yesterday which was so easy just screwing in the legs tightly for the price it's wonderful... it doubles as a coffee table and a kid table and it's small so good in our small living room excuse the mess in the background picture I'm in the middle of laundry and I have three kids lol this isn't Pinterest hope this was helpful in you buying a decent cheap coffee table
customer_reviews.author: stevean gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, inexpensive, coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee table for my apartment. I bought it based off the price and the look of it. For $30, it is much better than expected as it does not look cheap at all and it is very easy to assembly. Assembly just involves screwing the 4 legs on to the table and you are good to go. It is very light and easy to move around the room if needed. I would defiantly purchase this coffee table again if this one ever needs replacing because for $30 you cannot go wrong. It is perfect for anyone's budget.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight table. Not totally modular.
customer_reviews.text: 1) This parsons table is decent looking and easy to assemble (leases than 5 minutes). 2) Not modular with rectangular Parsons tables, due to different dimensions. 3) Finishes on corners are easily scuffed/damaged. 4) Although modern looking, this is NOT a high end table. You will realize the quality in person...photos do not convey it well.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Sent to me in junk condition
customer_reviews.text: When i got this table one of the legs was reattached in an awful attempt to suowr glue it. It had alot of noticable scratches on it. I really liked this table but it was sent to me in poor condition. The leg that was reattached ended up breaking 2 weeks later and I could not fix it so I ebed uo having to just throw it away. Next time I wont take the term Gently used so lightly.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for the price
customer_reviews.text: At less than I'd pay for an Ikea side table of almost identical dimensions [at the time I ordered it, anyway - prices fluctuate], it couldn't be better (in every sense :P ). It's a simple, functional side table that's very easy to put together and doesn't wobble or seem flimsy enough to buckle under a stack of books and a lamp. It's in no way offensive to look at, but I wouldn't try making it fit in with some fancy suite of high-end bedroom furnishings or the like. And I definitely advise against standing on it, for what I hope are obvious reasons. :D
customer_reviews.author: spoonfeeding

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: our old coffee table had a broken leg and needed to be replace. My wife puts her sewing machine on it when she is working. This very reasonably priced coffee table arrived quickly and the assembly was so easy that my wife did it without waiting for me or my son to get home. That's saying a lot. It has stood up to my grandchildren and looks good. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Oklamathman

customer_reviews.title: I understand it's budget, but didn't expect it to be made of cardboard.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but the surface is already bubbling up in an area i put a coffee mug on, so i expect it to chip in a couple of months. It is made of cardboard, not even pressed sawdust. For just permanent display, without any expectations of surface resistance, i'd say it's okay, but keep in mind it won't stand moisture at all.
customer_reviews.author: Satorikn

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for the waiting room in my office. Easy to assemble, you just twist on each leg. I knocked off 1 star because it isn't even. The table wobbles because one or more legs are shorter/longer than the others. Its purpose is to hold magazines on carpet so it isn't a huge deal for me, but something worth mentioning if someone where to put this on hardwood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: SOLID FIT / SIMPLE ASSEMBLY / PERFECT PRICE / EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice basic end table that can be used for just that or a printer table next to a desk. It took me 5 minutes to assemble! there is the base, the legs with screws already in them and no hardware. Just simply turn the legs until they are tight and then done! I bought two of them and am going to buy two more. This color (black) was $13 on Amazon Prime. You will not find a table for a better price. ***HIGHLY RECOMMENDED***
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Bulls Fan 70

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard
customer_reviews.text: This table is pretty much cardboard. It is good for temporary use. Do not put anything wet over it and treat it as you would treat a very fragile ceramic piece, because it can break. I bought as a temporary solution because of the price, but you get what you pay for. Fast shipping though. Amazon Prime is the best of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Mckinnis

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered light gray.like it!! Got it for a side table. Careful to not use water on it. Use a coaster!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the description fool you, this is an excellent piece
customer_reviews.text: This end table is no joke. I just moved and lost almost all of my furniture. The TV console I ordered was stolen by neighbors immediately [because an inept mail carrier thought it was a good idea to leave it unattended UNDER the the mailbox in a building with no cameras or monitoring staff] and I had to place my 32" TV on this. No sweat. It took it with style. I'll be ordering 2 more of these soon. I need to complete my living room and this will be a necessary part of that. It's beautifully modern. Just my style.
customer_reviews.author: James Marshall

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS, so sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh what can i say!!! ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS TABLE!!!! So sturdy. My friends and i were drinking and one of us fell on the table while trying to reach for the tv remote. He fell really bad even got some scratches and bruises from that. But this table!!??? It was still standing and maintained the shape!!! Its a miracle right, what can u say. If i could buy more, i would buy 10 from this and even put it in bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Nomintuya

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, cute, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, the 4 legs already have screws in them and just screw onto the table, took maybe 2 minutes. Looks nice and is a really sturdy little table, can handle my cat jumping on and off of it often and doesn't wobble. Perfect size, exactly what i was looking for. Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Anekah Henson

customer_reviews.title: Lego table for way less if you DIY with this table
customer_reviews.text: My boys love legos. I wanted to get a table so they can create and get stuff off the floor. Saw a few people use the end tables as Lego tables so we got the coffee tables. We have not glued down the base plates as the boys love to interchange things. 6 Base plates fit on a coffee table with some off edges and some room on far ends. My boys don't mind and they have be able to work and rework creations and saves us from stepping on AS Many pieces as before.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Maples-Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Worth it very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase it arrived in a timely manner no delays no scratches no discoloration everything attached perfectly, was one of the most easiest simple assemble of my life! I am using it for a laptop computer time corner table for my little one whom I am homeschooling so it works perfectly not 100% sturdy it seems like it couldn’t hold something very heavy, but works for us and or needs
customer_reviews.author: Jbird

customer_reviews.title: Low price, low quality product
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 3 stars because it's a beautiful table, but any slight movements of the table can cause cracks and bumps. I moved the table slightly towards me and the particle board cracked on the corner 1 day after assembly. I don't recommend this for anyone looking for a coffee table that you'd move around, it's meant to be completely stationary. The price is great, but not a long term coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lowrance

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The table is perfect if you’re looking for something cheap with no frills. Took me 2 seconds to screw the legs in and it’s light enough to carry anywhere. I saw some reviews that say the table is like particle board and not sturdy. I disagree with that. The table appears to be very sturdy and is holding my bearded dragon tank which is really heavy. Overall I’m really happy I decided to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: It's decent.
customer_reviews.text: It's decent. It isn't the best of quality, but it gets the job done. There are few very very small scratches along the edges, but they aren't noticeable. The table is light. In terms of durability, it seems like it will hold just about anything except anything too heavy like a person's weight. I won't be sitting on it or letting anyone else sit on it. Overall, I am satisfied with my purchase, but I do feel the price should be decreased a bit. Maybe $20~$25, but that's just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bae

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Durable Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I needed a black, simple end table to store stuff on. This literally takes less than 5 minutes to put together because all you do is screw in each leg and that is it. The end table is modern-looking and can really go anywhere in the house. I have used it in the living room, master bedroom, second bedroom, and kitchen. It is a very versatile piece that holds at least 40 lbs of weight without issue. I also know that it handles spills well because I have spilled many times on it and the wood still looks brand new without any signs of wear or tear after two years of use.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Steady, simple though able
customer_reviews.text: This table is for my living room, and it works perfectly. It’s the perfect COFFEE table. If you’re looking for a huge table this isn’t it. But it fits perfect as the center piece for my living room. NO TOOLS NEEDED. It comes with the screws inside the table legs, and you just screw it onto the table. Very light as well... so no difficulties moving it around. Would highly recommend, great for the price too! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Kayla J

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap coffee table, and this one was the most affordable. It's the perfect size and lightweight enough that I can easily move it by myself. Assemble was a piece of cake; you just twist the legs into the pre-driled holes. It came flawless without any blemishes. The only con about it is the sharp corners, but I can solve that with rubber baby proofing corner bumpers. I'll update this review after we own it for a while to comment on the durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, the price says it all...waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This mystery “wood” table is a piece of junk. It was purchased for a kids college apt and put from the mail truck into the packed car. The only reason I didn’t return it because I would have had to lug it all the way home and it wasn’t worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Green

customer_reviews.title: Descent table for the money
customer_reviews.text: I gave this table 5 stars not because it a great looking, wonderfully made table, but because it's functional and easy to put together. I bought it for my granddaughters to play on, and it fits the bill. Although it's not sturdy enough to sit on, this table is the perfect height for a child to sit at to color, play tea party, eat lunch, play games or anything else a child does sitting down. It would be perfect for a college student who wants an inexpensive coffee table too. Just don't expect a gorgeous piece of furniture because it isn't, but it IS functional and will probably serve your purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bananie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for a simple addition of table space and convenience
customer_reviews.text: Totally great, plain, light little table. The gray blends in as a nice neutral. Low to the ground, so really meant as an end table to a couch, rather than a bed. Easy to assemble and move around. Enough space for plants and drinks and books. It's a little more square and wide than it seems in the picture. I bought two and am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought a second!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my offices and LOVE them! Bought one and it stood the test of time (over a year) without damage. It is also super easy to clean and lightweight, so when i got a second office, i purchased another and have not been disappointed in my choice. Super easy to assemble and it works well for why I need it. It's sizable but not bulky and doesn't scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessC

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute, easy to assemble, decent quality, arrived with minor blemishes
customer_reviews.text: This table was a breeze to assemble and has a simple look that could pair well with many types of decor. It feels reasonably sturdy and looks cute in my apartment. The only downside is that it arrived with some minor blemishes although they honestly look worse in the up close photo I took than in real life (see photo). It's the best table in this style that I could find for the price, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: Great, cheap, lightweight little coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for; a super cheap, very lightweight table. My wife and I play a lot of card and tabletop games. For some reason she really likes to sit on the floor but I don't like bending over to play a game that is on the floor. This is a great solution. It weighs very little, is a great size, was super easy to put together. Altogether a great little table. I mean, it's cheap particlboard and stuff. Not going to be something you pass on to your kids, but very utilitarian and it actually looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: G. FarnsworthTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Great table low price
customer_reviews.text: Great Table fro the price. The grain makes it look much more expensive than it is. We use it in our small family /playroom its perfect. Our daughter can pull a chair up to it to build or color but it looks much nicer than a child's table. Its the perfect size for our use. It was super easy to assemble just screw int he legs. it came well packaged and on time.It's very light weight but that hasn't been a problem. We have been using it for a couple of months and its holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. No chemical smell when I took it out of the box, super easy to assemble, perfect standard size coffee table. It’s perfect for mild jobs, I use mine for guests to put their beverages and snacks in the living room and looks great. It’s a very light weight so easy to move around. It has to be treated with care, after all it only costs $35 other than that, great table!
customer_reviews.author: Jsf1313

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this product fit my expectation. It’s not fancy. But, it’s not ugly either. More importantly, it works!
customer_reviews.author: HanwenLi

customer_reviews.title: It's just like the Ikea version
customer_reviews.text: I don't have Ikea by me or the ability to have them ship to my obscure home and this table was the more expensive twin to theirs. So it was worth it to me in the moment, but for $9 at your local ikea... your choice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, four legs do not have the same length
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review on this jiggly table now. I put a folded paper under the shorter leg to make it better. Since shipping this big package back will be annoying, I don' even bother to do so. The only good aspect of it is it's easy to assemble...But you can feel how cheap the material is.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple end-table. After one year it became a little loose and the coating material is looseing on the edges but a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shabby

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, can dress up or keep causual. But due to the simplicity the price range is high. It has been sturdy for a mini fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Parsons tables.
customer_reviews.text: These tables look very nice and modern. They have a flat gray paint finish. I purchased 2 for $11.27 each! What a deal! I'm using the 2nd table top as my base and adding 4 casters instead of using the other legs. I really likes the way they compliment my modern decor.
customer_reviews.author: dinat

customer_reviews.title: For the price good value - purchased for a home for air Bnb
customer_reviews.text: Was able to assemble in under 5 minutes. Cheap material but serves the purpose. Affordable. I am using it for a home that I am offering for AIR BNB. Perfect. I like the white color, gives it a modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for broke (ex)college kid
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap, pretty end table to go with my white and navy living room. I ordered this and was NOT disappointed! I assembled it myself in under 10 minutes, no tools needed just like it said. It's the perfect size and fits in nicely with my decor. As a recent college grad, I was very happy with the price, design, and functionality of the product. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SierraH

customer_reviews.title: No stress to assemble...looks great!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a simple, short, side table- BUY THIS! I dread assembling furniture. Not because I can't or need help. But because 99% of the time the directions are 10 times harder than they need to be, or the method is overly complicated. I was so relieved when I opened the box to find NO hardware...and one sheet of paper. The screws are already in the legs, put the table top upside down, twist the legs in, BOOOM...you've got a table! It doesn't look or feel like a $14 table. Ten times better than anything on the shelf at your local Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Ann

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Parsons Modern End Table, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Brown| Style Name:End TableKeep your essentials close by with the Ameriwood Home Parsons End Table. Made of PVC laminated hollow core, the beautiful espresso finish pairs well with any style and decor. Keep your reading lamp, remotes, and electronics on the table top to have everything you need for a night in within reach. The minimalistic design is ideal for small spaces like dorm rooms and first apartments. The sturdy construction and water resistant finish will keep this End Table looking great for years to come. The End Table ships flat to your door and requires minimal assembly upon opening. Simply attach the 4 legs to begin using. Once assembled, the End Table measures to be 17. 5"H x 20"W x 20"D.
feature_bullets: Simple, sturdy design. The minimalistic design is perfect for dorm rooms and small apartments
Made of PVC laminated hollow core, the beautiful espresso finish pairs well with your existing décor
The water resistant finish allows you to easily clean spills by wiping with a damp cloth
Finish your living room with the Ameriwood Home Parsons End Table

The End Table ships flat to your door and requires minimal assembly upon opening. Simply attach the 4 legs to begin using. The table top can hold up to 50 lbs. Assembled dimensions: 17. 5"H x 20"W x 20"D

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars7,084 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
